column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The poutine was definitely the star of the show. I would highly recommend it if you stop in here. The fries were seasoned nicely
column2: the pork belly and gravy and cheese curds were really rich
column3: and the fried egg was the perfect compliment. My friend ordered the house short rib. I had a bite and it was amazing. Order this is you choose to go for dinner.
